values:
Its been a very long time since i have been on here...since Jan.

I actually had to sit and think for about 3 mins. to what my username and password was...

then when it came back...i was shocked to see that people even still use this!

I figured everyone wen to Myspace and forgot all about this....

...just thought id update just because its been months...

peace out*

I AM SO MAD THAT THE COLTS LOST..VANDERJACK..REALLY SUCKS!!! WE CAME SO FAR AND THEN THEY BLOW IT..GO FIGURE...

 

UGH...

...THERE IS A SNOW STORM UH COMING...HEHE...I LOVE IT..

..THEN I CAN GO SLEDDING...AND SNOWBOARDING....

BECKY...WE NEED A NEW SNOWBOARD THOUGH..SINCE YOURS GOT BROKE LAST YEAR..WE NEED TO GO....

Well, it's been awhile since i wrote. Alot, has happened since the last time.

Anyways..idk if anyone else watched the Colts game today..but DAMN..we are kicking some ASS! We are 12-0 heck ya! We killed those guys. Maybe this year we will go  A      L         L     T           H   E           W         A             Y!!!!

haha...that would be kool..it hasnt happened in forever!

 

So..christmas is coming!!! hehe..i love christmas time..so happy and cheery...

...ya today i took my dog out to play in the snow..and i fall flat on my butt! First time of many times to come this winter.

..... Im so excited today me and like 5 other friends are going to get free dinner by the Elks and then we have a meeting about Saturday..and then again on saturday we get free dinner!!! SWEET!

Saturday we are all being D. Drivers..for the cancer dance...and we get tips and what not..but its gonna be fun..then i think we are all gonna go to Muncie and stay..cause my house is going to be full of drunk ppl.

 

*                             *                        *                   *                 *             *                 *                   *

 

                  THANKSGIVING!

           Not much longer...and all that  F O O D! HEHE

i love thanksgiving..its one of my favorite holidays......then christmas..would be next.. i can't wait to see all my family and..i can't wait till we get snow..so i can go sledding...and snowboarding..lol..i ust hope i dont kill myself this year..haha

OOOOOO.. BECKY! DO YOU REMEMBER...when we went and we made that huge ramp..and about killed ourselves...cause we where trying to be kool..haha..fun times!

Saturday was a blast...we had a lil group of us over at my dad's and had a party! Which was sweet cause my Marmie even partyed it up with us..haha...

 

It was great..some ppl. got a lil trashed..haha...

Thanks everyone for coming..spike..jordan..lauren..megan..terra...tyler..jenny..eric..brandon..and to anyone i left out..thanks for coming...

it was a great time!

Well today..i cleaned my room from 3-6! Its so freakin sharp..lol

 

I got a huge shocker today...

                i was talkin on my phone and i hear the door bell ring and im just about to walk out the back door....

so i walked to the front of the house...open the door...and

           B

                

                         E

                                     N

                 H E L M

                                          is standing on my porch!

 

I was still on the phone and my mouth hit the floor and i forgot i was on the phone until i hear hello..hello ya there...

      i was like uh..can i call you back.....

                 S

                      H

                            O

                                C

                                    K

he brought his famous friend..and we went to his dad's and had dinner then we all went to DQ for some ice cream

and sat in there and talked forever.

I was SPEECHLESS!
H    A   P   P   Y     H    A   L   L    O    W    E    E    N!

IT'S OFFICAL...MY BROTHER IS NOW A MARRIED MAN!!!!!!!!!!!!

LAURA LOOKED AMAZING...AND SO DID ALL THE GROOMS..AND OF COURSE US BRIDES MAIDES..HAHA

CONGRATS GUYS I LOVE YA!

Alright..just cause i post that..doesn't mean you have to test it out!

 

                       HAHA..I'm sorry i freakin love you!

If you ever need a friend I will be there. If you ever need to talk I am here. If you feel alone I'm here with you.

If you are drunk I will bail your sorry ass out and help you lie to your stupid parents!!!

IT'S MY BIRTHDAY!!!!!!!!!!!

 

HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO ME HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO ME HAPPY BIRTHDAY HAPPY BIRTHDAY HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO ME!!!!!! KINDS AND QUEENS AND BISHOPS TO WE WANT TO WISH THE BEST TO YOU SO WISH DAY WASH DAY WHATA SAY BITHDAY..HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO ME! HAPPY BIRHTDAY TO ME HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO ME HAPPY BIRTHDAY HAPPY BRITHDAY..H A P P Y B I R T H D A Y    T O   M    EEEEEEEEE!!!

 

HEHE...

19 BABY!
....i just dont get it..i dnt even know what to do..
I CAN'T BELIEVE THIS HAPPENED....
HAHA..I WAS SO HAPPY! TODAY SEASON 5 OF SMALLVILLE STARTED..HECK YEAH..IM WAY HAPPY!

..Im glad some ppl. are coming home for the HomeComing!  I'm ready to see them!  I miss my Shauna and Stewy!! And..duh..of course i miss my BENNY! I need to see my shot takin drunk buddy..JORDAN! HAHA! And ADAM>>chruchy!! I miss him..he cracks me up..then im off to megs!

Friday here i come..hehe

i thought i had it all figured it out

i thought i knew what i wanted

          now, everything feels likes it's been tossed into the air.
Im begging to think i was wrong about everything.

         wrong about what i was feeling and thinking.

I don't think i should of felt that way.  I know what i wanted, but now 

it's like it's been taken away. And the really hard part is it's been taken

  without me even saying so.

So, i guess it's time i ....

...this whole weekend i can sum up into one word...amazing!

I got to hang out with friends in munice again..we went to Brit's party and of course Corby got way drunk...he was throwing stuff at the taco bell ppl. and tryed to get out of the car while it was still moving..lol..but i love him! Meg and I had fun dancing and targeting people..lol

Saturday was ...> O MY GOD!  A special someone spent the weekend with me and we had a blast together!!!  We made  BROWNIES ..(hehe also an inside joke) (ha..an "inside" joke) anyways the brownies were good with fudge icing..yum and i cooked dinner for us and we layed around all day just the two of us spending time together and catching up..i loved it!

I got a surprise as well..a good friend came by to see me..she didnt tell me she was going to be town because she want it to be surprise and indeed it was! I haven't seen her since grad. I loved it thanks!

anyways..i cant really say the exact reason why it was so AMAZING..but lets just say..it was great and i can't wait till next weekend!

...so for me this week has gone a lil slow...ready for the weekend again..

things are a lil..well stressful i guess you would say..i find myself snapping at people and i dont mean to, but then again i can't really help it. A person can only handle so much ya know...and...i know a lot of things are going on and what may or never happen. I have tryed to ignore it and act like nothing is going on and forget, but it's there.  The bad thing is its starting to effect my motivation..as in school work..im not really fallin behind just find myself highly not wanting to do it and just have a good time get away not have to worry.  ..i just keep waiting for something good to walk into my life and im beginning to think it's just not going to happen.

chin up

I was so freakin pumped about Friday..getting to see all of my friends and hanging out with them. 

OK, so after hugging everyone and going to the dance i went to munice..and freakin drank my ass off!  I took so many shots back to back..i wont be doing that for awhile...lol

So we go to kyle's brothers first and im shocked cause i run into someone i didnt expect to see..drank there..and then went to Corby's house..well actually the party was down stairs so its Codi's house anyways...i had 13 or 14 shots...omg...i was so drunk..lol
 
Jordan tells me the next day i tryed to get into someone's car at a used car lot..lol..oops and i dont remember doing that..lol

I was so fuckin hungover the next day.. i got home and slept from 12-9 and stayed up for 3 hours and went to bed and didnt get up today till 11!

So as of now i HATE VODKA!

lol
...SO im sitting here waiting in 6 yo come so i can get out of school! It sucks cause im so ready for tonight! Im ready to see some freinds and hang out. I love the weekends..they freakin rock!

"I DONT CARE I WANT YOU OUT...GO LIVE WITH YOUR DAD FOR ALL I CARE"

"YOU THINK IM JOKIN LEAVE NOW!"

..yeah just two lil minor things my mom just said to me...we just got into a huge fight and i have been crying for like an hour now.  I can't believe some things she just said to me and they way she said them.

I swear these last few months have been so hard on me...i feel like im losing everything..and i just dont feel happy anymore. I have even thought about leaving..going for away..as in you have to take a plain to get there.  Then i dont have to worry about anything..and not talk to anyone just focus on nothing but school and me.

I dont know i have had so many feelings and thoughts and i have kept all of them bottled up inside for so long and more is being adding idk how much i can take...i know what you are thinking(my close buds) i have always tryed to be stronger than i really am..i try to take way to much sometimes..but i cant help it.. i have to deal with things must people never will or never had to at my age..and i was taught that feelings and emotions and crying is a weakness.

But i think that not dealing with it and keeping it all inside..is a weakness as well...

so i guess.....  .. im weak

well i qm ABOUT to freakin just pass out cause im so tired....its just been kinde one of those thinking days you know...and i just dnt get some people. u would think someone you hadnt seen in like 4 weeks would want to see you since you are cxlose friends but i guess not.  then you got your other friend that lies about what was going on the night before trying to hide something...idk..tnhat and i have been drinking to so it doesnt help any...omg i walked for an hour in high heels...it sucked cause someone a girl was being a bitch..whatever..idc i had fun tonight but i think i just need to go to bed cause im feelin kinda tired ...i just dont freakin know what to do anhmore..i dont understand people sometimes or maybe just certain people at all...im tired of being alone andim tired of being u sed...

im done playin peoples games...anyways..shout out to megan h. girl i hjad a blast wit you tonight..you wher ecrackin me up and so was shawn...and Meg. you are the best you make me laugh...haha hold tht shjit in girl...that was funny...this weejkedn has been a blast and its kinda suicked at the sometime//...these  last few days ok i lied weeks ive been in this fdeep thinking mood anmd all
let me tell you some people are really annoying when they been drinking alot...like really gay and slut like as well..i wish that you would step out from that ledge my frined..haha
and some people ask to many questions when they been drinking,,,well idj i think im gonna get off here o i have a birthday coming up heck yeah

sometimes in a room full of people i feel like im alone..like there really isnt anyone there.  I am the only one..off somewhere else..

I have been single for awhile now and i enjoyed some of it and really hated some of it as well.  I have had to get over someone i got very close to after a break up from hell that ripped me apart and sent me somewhere i never want to be again. I miss what i use to have i miss the closeness you share with another..idk...i also miss my friends.

..........
>>>>>>>
.......

sometimes i wonder if you ever think about the good times we had together and how it felt to be around each other...
i wonder if you ever think about what we could of been like i do sometimes. i cant help but wonder sometimes.... how happy we could of been how long we would be together..if it would be forever.  

anyways..i gone.

Im so exicited my brother is coming home today he wont be here till later on..so idk if i will get to see him today but i will tomorrow. I cant wait i havent seen him for awhile.  He will only be here for the weekend and then i wont see him till the wedding. GRRRR! I miss him.

Im at Codi's right now waiting on him to get out of the shower and then idk what im gonna do. Im listening to his and josh's cd. They are way good. Josh is a BS singer. He is so good and looks like an A&E model!!!

Anyways...here i have been wanting to update and i cant cause i havent had the time and i have time and i dont know what to say...grrr..makes me mad.  

I had to take 2 hours of notes today for one class..i didnt think it was ever gonna end. I had 4 pages full. You think your note taking in BIO sucks wait till you get to College..it blows.

Im so ready for this Yearbook dance im ready to see some of my friends..i miss em so bad. LIke my Stew girl..lol..

Well i guess ill stop ..so see ya.

I stayed at Lake Cumberland this weekend..thats in Kentucky..it was a blast..we went swimming and hiking back through waterfalls..it was sweet..and we went ridding ont he jet ski and then we hooked up this hude tube called Big Bertha...and rode around in that...until i almost died..lol..he was going so fast it was flyin..lol...Shrey and I ended up in the water! 

She said she was falling out and he turned on her side and i go o shit we will tip..and well i was right she fell out and i was still in..and the tube was in the air and flip upside down with me in it and sent me flyin i hit my ribs so hard they are bruised and the rope caught my leg and sliced open my knee..its sweet and all swollen.

We went ridding around on trails with the 4-wheeler too. We had a blast though...today..i am so sore i can barely walk right..lol but it was all worth it..im so ready to go back...i think im going in the fall too.

...so i haven't gotten any sleep hardly this whole week im not sure why. I have been writing papers and doing shit ton of reading for school...blah


....you know what though i have come to one conclusion..im tired of being alone...i have been since like oct. and i hate it..i really do

...and i hate not being around my friends..i miss them so much!


   ....maybe thats why i cant sleep...

..GAS OUT DAY SEPT. 3 NO ONE BUY GAS NATIONWIDE STRIKE....

IM SURE SOME OF YOU HAVE ALREADY HEARD THIS FROM ME WEEKS AGO BUT SPREAD THE WORD SOME FRIENDS AND I STARTED THIS AND NOW TONS OF PEOPLE KNOW..ITS BEEN ON THE RADIO..SO KEEP IT TELL EVERYONE..DONT BUY GAS SETP. 3


        and i have to go now cause im gonna go ride my pocket rocket..hehe
OK YOU DIRTY PEOPLE..LOL...I DIDNT MEAN THAT IN A SEXUAL WAY OR SEXUAL TOY..GOOD...ITS THE LIL MINNY MOTORCYCLE THINGS..GOD..LOL

..thanks for the comments...

 It's been 3 days since my closest friend left and it feels like 2 weeks!  It really sucks!  I feel so gloomy all the time..and i have noticed im in a bitchy mood sometimes too..like the other day i kinda..went all shity on my mom..and i shouldn't have.  All i do now days is go to school do homework and work out and watch tv.  O yeah and ride my pocket rocket..thats my new life.

..and it sucks way bad...lets just say close to....
 depressed!

...ok so far school is ok..kinda hard but its alright...

   ...one of my best friends already left for college and its over 5 hours away and my other best friend is leaving this sunday! I DONT KNOW WHAT IM GONNA DO.  Im going to be so lonely!!!!  And his college is about 2 hours away but he has class everyday and i have it and..i just dont know how im gonna be able to see em!

      IM single which suchs...my close buds are leaving me...feelin kinda lonely...what are you thoughts on this..

..well the other day was kinda fun.  Ben and I went to Munice to pay for my books and then went to my dads house...well we are sitting out on the porch talking and i see 3 ghoats on the roof of a barn...i was like omg there are ghoats on the roof what the hell...so we all started laughin and watched em for awhile..they couldnt get down they where scared..so i was like D im gonna go help em..so Ben and i walk over there and i climb the fence..they also had cows and horses and a donkey and stuff..and i have Ben give me a bost and i climb on the roof and pick up theses two ghoats and hand them down to ben..they are not lil ghoats they are big ones..then the third one was scared and running around on the roof and im chasing...it..lol and i almost fell off for the second time..cause the first one i picked up when i was leaning over to hand him down he started to go crazy and i didnt want to drop him and hurt him..so i FALL off the roof..the ghoat was ok..lol..thats what matters..then i almost fall off again chasing the other ghoat but i caught myself..lol
 
Deanna was crackin up and so was Ben..i was laughing to cause it was funny!  Then when we where walking back there is a cord that run from this Shed to the fence and it was low and i didnt see it cause i had my head turned and i get closed lined..LMAO...and then there is a wire that is about a foot from the ground and you cant see it..i trip over that and so did ben..lol...i was like good dang..what the heck..lol...

ITS NOT OVER YET!  I get home and we have ducks in our yard so i have to chase them..what a day...

..ok so today was a fun day..i went to munice paid for the rest of my books and then went to my dads for awhile and o yeah at noon ben came over and we went to PIzza Hit for lunch and then went to his house cause i was gonna play with the cat buit i kinda passed out on the couch and then went to my house and to munice and then to my dads house..

ANYWAYS...

MEg and I went to munice to go to a party we..it was at Corby's house it was a blast there was about 15 or more of us no counting me..everyone was drunk or HUNK..lol...inside joke...i for once was not the safe driver..haha bithces...hehe..they where all crackin me up big time..and josh and cody played for me..they rock..they are in a bad or well they have a band josh is such a good singer it sound slike you are listen to a cd or something and cody is good to he plays guitar..we all drank but meg cause she drove us home..me and her home that is..so im lil well u know..lol

OOOOOOOOOOOOOOO..i got a shake from steak n shake it was way good! I seen spike in munice i passed him..he lieves there now i didnt know that...well i got about 6 hours of sleep today and i have been running all day and now drinking up running around in munice..im dead tired and need to get some sleep so im outy

...Morgan...haha inside joke...

..HANNAH*

I just dont understand why things happen sometimes..i have been so stressed and scared for a couple of weeks cause of my brother and school starting and everyone moving away...my mom and i where getting along real good better than we have in years!  Now,lately, she has bee a BITCH..all she does is yell at me nothing is ever good enough no matter what i do..i help her around the house..with the kids..and do the yard work when she needs helps or asks me to do it..i keep the upstairs clean and do my chores in the dwn stairs..but all she does is put me down and yell at me all the time..

example: Tonight
 she was pissed cause i went to the V-ball game...i came home and she yelled at me and said that im not a high school student im not allowed to go to school events or go to the hight school and i dont need to be friends with high schoolers..and that she doesn't care how old i am im gonna be in by 9 mon-friday!

Yeah, how much of a bitch is that..on top of that Ben and I get into a huge fight cause he has been as ass to me lately so i got tired of it cause he blew me off again tonight..and he tells me that he is tryin to get use to not being around me and surpressing his feelings...aka pushing me away..because he is going to be leaving for college and needs to get use to it!

OK..thanks alot..and he tells me all kinds of crazy stuff..we fought from 9:30-11:30 ..freakin nuts

I was suppose to go with Eric and Corey and some others to go have some fun..but then my mom and I got into a huge fight and then Bruce got into it..on top of me and ben fighting...OMG!!!!!!!! saying that they want me out..

....on top of all that my brother has been in the hosiptal for weeks he just gets out and then had to go back in and now he's out again..and they keep giveing different kinds of meds. tryin to kill and keep this STAFF from coming back and his body is rejecting everything that they give him..cause it has to be only certain stuff...cause only certain meds. kill this rare type of STAFF..which is very very very very serious..kinda like cancer serious.  And if they dont find one that his body will accept...it's gonna kill him!!!!!!
We already almost lost him...for a week straight everyday i got off work i drove to Indy to see him and stayed with him till i had to leave and everyday after i left i just cryed the whole way home..cause him and i have always been very close..and even though his a boy..whenever anything happened or went wrong he always looked at me to be the stronger one to take charge..which was no big deal cause my dad raised me to be that way..and he also made me have to be that way..cause everything i went throught with him and and other stuff..my close freinds know what i mean..so when i was there i would never cry..and i tryed real hard to seem perfect and not bothered or worried a few he would say "whats wrong sis" and i was like o im tired hard day at work or i didnt feel so good or something..cause i didnt want him to feel alarmed...we didn't tell him everything that the doctor told us..because he would flip out and they where afraid it would make his condtion worse...he had 3 surgerys already!
He may not be able to go to school this year.

Plus i have been sick for 5 weeks now..u cant get it..it really sucks having this though.  My chest always hurts..im always druged up on pain med. for it..half the time im to tired to do anything cause of the meds. and the other half i dont have any strength to do antyhing..after i take a shower and get ready...im ready for a nap. mY head always hurts really bad..my eyes hurt..it hurts to look around lights hurt.  I walk everyday 2 or 3 miles and then run 2 miles at night..and i have been on a diet for 2 and half weeks now..i have lost 10 lbs. 'i think that may have something to do with my not havin energy to..idk'

it's just i have all this stuff sitting on me and i dont know what to do...i like someone and i dont think he likes me back..it kinda bugs me..im scared about school..im scared cause its new and different and im scared im not gonna be able to do it...and im gonna be a failure...

you know it really bugs me when someone tells you that they are going to do something and then they don't and they don't even bother calling you or anything they just..let you hang dry..it kinds pisses me off..and they do it more than once...you could atleast be grown up and tell the person..thats just plain rude!

Anyways..today is kinda bored too..but atleast it's not rainy out...I think im gonna go to Sam's and hang out with her and Stew and Chris..then i have to come home and find out whats going down at the Kaiser house and then Jamie and I are gonna go to the V-ball game tonight to support some friends...YOU GO GIRLS..KICK ASS..LOL

..good luck

 

*hannah

EWWWW

 

these past two days have been just blah..all rainy and dark..which i dont mind cause i can sleep in but after i get up i want it all sunny and nice.  Today has been slow moving..i got up and played around on the computer for awhile and then went to Jamie's house to chill for a few hours then came home and Addy came over and we went to Pizza Slut to eat..now im back home and im bored with nothing to do.

Yesterday sucked i felt sick all day i just kinda layed around and watched tv. I feel all out of place cause usually i walk and run a few miles everyday and i haven't the last two days..cause of the weather..so i feel kinda weird.  Well i guess i will go see if there is anything on Tv..my mom is being a bitch right now i dont know what her deal is..so if anyone wants to do something let me know!

...hannah

**** 4 STARS!

 

Jamie and I went to the Rascal Flatts concert the other day..it was sweet!  They freakin rocked!  I recorded some songs on my phone and it sounds neat...the part where the crowd is just singing sounds way kool!  I had a blast..they even did some old rock songs..i loved it!  But before the concert we went out to eat and then when we got to the State Fair we rode some killer rides before the concert started.  We had a blast..they have some neat lil set ups there. I wouldn't mind going back there.

Of course we had to get some dippin dots..i mean HELLO..who doesn't like them..they are the best. I swear they should sell them at Harvest or somewhere..lol...we got shirts and i got a hat too... cause i freakin forgot mine before we left..cause i was all drugged up..lol..

When we where leavin we parked right by their buses i kept peakin through tryin to see em...ha ha i looked stupid but o well..if they seen me they got a laugh...o man traffic was a bitch we sat there for about 15 minutes before we even got on the road...this real hot guy let me out..it was funny cause we where sitting there talkin about these two guys and then the hot one in the passeneger seat let me go..i should of got his number..DAMN IT! It's all Jamie's fault!

We all stopped at Steakin n shake on the way home...it was sooooooo good! It was my day off so i eat anything i wanted too..hehe...

well im dead tired..i just got done running two miles and takin a shower im ready to hit the sack now!

                   ....hannah

...wow..this week has been stressful..today was a real hard day for me...i have been in Indy all day at the Hospital.  My brother was admited into Anderson 5 days ago...and today they moved him to Indy...not good news..i got a phone call saying that his STAFF infection is killing him..and it's very serious..he has to have surgery right away..then two more after that.  Plus alot of other stuff i just rather not mention it all...i cryed for about 5 minutes real hard..and then took off and went to Indy to be with him...my brother and i are real close...

I have never seen him like this...then the nurses came to do all this work to him...and his fever came back and he was shakin cause he was so cold and screamin...that went on forever..and nick wasnt helping any he kept yelling also which made it worse...and i was about to flip out...

i kept tryin to keep him busy by makin look at me and talkin to him and asking questions..cause he was in so much pain and all the stuff they where doing to him...i had to walk out once cause i almosted started to cry...i did good though i never cryed in front of him..i held it together..but i cryed on the way home...

and the rest of the week sucks..cause i need to go up there tomorrow..and i work from 9-3 and then i work from 8 to 3 and then the next day i have to pick up my sister and take her to court and then work 8-3 and then friday i work 9-2

plus i have to drive to Indy to be with my brother..omg

and i am so tired..i fell asleep in the waiting room today when they took him to do a test..one out of 100 they have done in the last 5 days....everytime they take him he wants me to go...he told the nurses he's not going unless i can go with him..lol..

i have all this stuff going on...and im so scared i just cant seem to sleep but a  few minutes at a time..so i hope this helps..cause i have no one to talk to and i think if i get some of it off my chest i'll be able to sleep..i have to get some sleep cause i have to get up and go to work till 3 and then go to Indy and then work from 8-3...im gonna be dead..and i feel like shit...which doesn't help any...

alright im gonna go now..

i love ya buddy and i am praying for you...im not gonna lose you yet!

so much can happen in such little time...i had my open house and graduation and a death in the family all in a week. It's been a little crazy around here..so much to do and get done.  I'm glad its the weekend so that i can spend time with some one...

Today is kinda an odd day it was hot and sunny and then it got dark and windy..and then it started to rain real hard now its back to hot and sunny...someone needs to make up there mind..ok just joking its thundering like crazy..lol..idk im lost.

All right i think im gonna lay down its been a hard day.

..well im so depressed we didnt win sectionals but somebody had to be the loser as my mother tells me. Yeah, well i didn't want it to be us.  I can't believe i have two days of school left and im done. It's really crazy!!

 

Sometime today i have to sit down and write a letter.  It's going to take me hours to do...it's gonna be one of the hardest letters i have ever written before.  I don't even  know how to start it or what to say really. I mean when i just think to myself i know what to say...it's all there and its not hard to say out loud but when i have to say it out loud and to the person it's like my mind goes blank..there's nothing there..i dont even know where to start.

I had a chance to last night and when it came up i was tryin to think of what to say and i couldn't and it was so hard if anything did.  I have never had that problem before..i have always been able to think quick on my feet..lol my friends know that cause when they have a minute to think of a lie they call me.."hey,what should say to my mom" ..lol

But for some reason this is different..i can't think quick and i don't know what to do.  I have never been so nervours and exicited all at the same time. It makes me want to cry thinking about it.  I feel like im setting myself up for a big disappointment and heart ache.  Who knows i guess i will have to wait till tonight to find out..if it happens tonight..i don't know if i'll do it or not. I want to bring it all up and asks some things and then give the letter..but i don't know...i guess i'll have to wait...

 

hannah

Anyways...i hope this weekend is better than last..i didnt really do anything over the weekend..a whole lot of nothing.  Man, im glad some stuff is done and out of the way..yesterday i had a CIC game and it was senior night like i said plus i had to be at an awards show for Voca and i had to meet my step mom and all this..its like gesh....

As you can see i have  alot to say cause im just going on about whatever just happens to pop into my head. Cause 3 of us learned that this can be used against you..lol- and the other two people haven't writen much since then..lol. I hate when people are gay.

LOL- wanna know something funny..im sitting here at school writting all this...now here's the catch..hehe...i am sitting in the ISR room..lol...yeah how gay is that...

now now...you know me better than that..im not in troulbe or anything..i didn't have anywhere to go for contact..well i did have some where to go but the teacher left and i couldn't be there withouth him so i had to go to the office and they sent everyone who didnt have anywhere to go up here. Never been in here before...and im glad cause it sucks. It's boring and the desks are gay and i feel confined or something idk.

OK well finally the bell is about to ring so im gonna go and write more later.

 

peace out!
